snippet: The defection of Gen. Manaf Tlass, a confidant of President Bashar al-Assad, drew attention last week but he has yet to make a public appearance, raising questions about his motives.
abstract: Mystery surrounding the whereabouts of Syrian Gen Manaf Tlass, a confidant of Pres Bashar al-Assad, has raised questions about his motives and intentions and dampened some of the enthusiasm that first greeted news of his decision to abandon the regime.

byline.original: By DAN BILEFSKY and MAÏA de la BAUME

lead_paragraph: The defection of Gen. Manaf Tlass, a confidant of President Bashar al-Assad, drew attention last week but he has yet to make a public appearance, raising questions about his motives.

headline.seo: Syria General’s Absence Raises Questions on Defection
headline.main: Top Syrian General Fails to Surface After Defecting
headline.print_headline: Syria General’s Absence Raises Doubts on Defection

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
